Title: Requires applications for property tax exemptions by nonprofit organizations be filed at the time of purchase of a property
Summary: Requires applications for property tax exemptions by nonprofit organizations be filed at the time of purchase of a property; provides that the attorney or agent responsible for filing such application shall be fined twenty-five percent of the property's assessed taxes if such application is not timely filed.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to requiring applications for property tax exemptions by nonprofit organizations be filed at the time of purchase of a property
